name: Aery (itch)
description:
Pitch



Aery takes place during the extinction of the last two lives dinosaurs. Gods will do everything in their power to exterminate the race and send them meteors. 

So Aery is a 2vs2 asynchronous speedrunner. The first team composed by runners have to cross the finish line but it will not be easy. The other team composed by trappers have to do mini games that will influence the runners in many way in their attempt to cross the finish line. Aery is a mix between Wario Ware and Speedrunner.





Controls Play the game in 1920x1080 resolution in order to don't have any bug
